Hello world API

To print “Hello world!”, you can use the print_hello_world() function:

test.main.print_hello_world(include_world=True)

A function for printing the text “Hello world!”

Parameters:

include_world (bool) – Optional - weather or not to include “world” in the printed output

See:

“Describing code in Sphinx” - https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/tutorial/describing-code.html

test.main.random_number(range=None)

A function that returns a random number

Parameters:

range (int[]) – Range (ex: [1, 100])

Returns:

A randomly generated number

Return type:

int
